mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VENDOR(ID, NAME, ADDRESS, TEL, BNAME, ACCOUNTNO, BADDRESS, BANK, SWIFTCODE, USINGYN, CREATEDATETIME, UPDATEDATETIME) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{address}, #{tel}, #{bName}, #{accountNo}, #{bAddress}, #{bank}, #{swiftCode}, #{usingYn}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE VENDOR SET NAME = #{name}, ADDRESS = #{address}, TEL = #{tel}, BNAME = #{bName}, ACCOUNTNO = #{accountNo}, BADDRESS = #{bAddress}, BANK = #{bank}, SWIFTCODE = #{swiftCode}, UPDATEDATETIME = NOW() WHERE USINGYN='Y' AND ID=#{id}
